module.name: pages
module.description: The heart and soul of Fork CMS. A Fork CMS website is administered through the pages module. Users can easily create, edit or delete a new page, or rearange it in the visual tree of the website. Adding/editing pieces of content as well as modules/widgets to the correct part of the page is simple and straightforward through the simplified visual representation of the webpage's design, that can be altered on each page independently.
